title: EP. 252 DO I LOOK LIKE A YORKIE TO YOU??
description:
Hell dates, heart attacks and replacing your man when he’s not doing what you need him too.

Cocktail: I Always Give That Top Tier 5 Star Sexy Lovin In The CarIngredients:

Don Julio Anejo

Lime juice

Drop of honey 


INSTRUCTIONS:

IN A MARTINI GLASS DROP A DASH OF HONEY IN THE BOTTOM OF THE GLASS

COMBINE DON JULIO AND LIME JUICE IN A SHAKER

SHAKE

AND STRAIN INTO MARTINI GLASS
